optionalInfo.fit:
Joe is wearing a size M
Joe 175 cm tall
Length: 68 cm
Chest width: 50 cm

Runs true to size
optionalInfo.care:
Do not machine wash.
Clean with a wet towel or wash by hand very gently.
optionalInfo.production: This vintage jacket is hand painted painted with acrylic paint on the back, covered with a matte acrylic finisher which makes it water resistant. The jacket features 2Pac / Tupac Amaru Shakur. The item has many details all over the jacket, like patches, fabric, charms and more. These details all represent a specific part in 2Pac's life.
optionalInfo.additionalNotes: This one of a kind jacket has a black colour, two pockets with buttons on the chest and two slit pockets on the front. The item has button details at the end of the sleeves and can be closed through buttons on the front.
